language.switcher: .lang-switcher{position:fixed;right:18px;top:120px;display:flex;flex-direction:column;gap:8px;z-index:60}.lang-btn{width:32px;height:22px;border-radius:6px;border:1px solid rgba(148,163,184,.5);background:rgba(255,255,255,.9);padding:0;cursor:pointer;box-shadow:0 6px 16px rgba(15,23,42,.08);transition:transform .2s ease,box-shadow .2s ease,border-color .2s ease,background-color .2s ease}.lang-btn:hover{transform:translateY(-2px) scale(1.03);box-shadow:0 12px 26px rgba(15,23,42,.18);border-color:rgba(59,130,246,.45);background:#ffffff}.lang-btn:active{transform:translateY(0) scale(1)}.lang-btn:focus-visible{outline:2px solid #3b82f6;outline-offset:2px}.lang-btn img{width:100%;height:100%;object-fit:cover;border-radius:5px;display:block}.lang-fade{transition:opacity .25s ease,transform .25s ease}.lang-fade.is-fading{opacity:0;transform:translateY(6px)}

interactions.icons: .interactive-icon{box-shadow:0 6px 16px rgba(15,23,42,.08);transition:transform .25s ease,box-shadow .25s ease,background-color .25s ease,border-color .25s ease}.interactive-icon:hover{transform:translateY(-1px) scale(1.06);box-shadow:0 14px 30px rgba(15,23,42,.16);background:rgba(59,130,246,.14) !important;border-color:rgba(59,130,246,.35)}.interactive-icon:active{transform:translateY(0) scale(1.02)}.social-icon{width:3rem;height:3rem;border-radius:.75rem;border:1px solid #e2e8f0;background:#f8fafc;display:inline-flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;box-shadow:0 6px 16px rgba(15,23,42,.08);transition:transform .25s ease,box-shadow .25s ease,background-color .25s ease,border-color .25s ease}.social-icon:hover{transform:translateY(-1px) scale(1.06);box-shadow:0 14px 30px rgba(15,23,42,.16);background:rgba(59,130,246,.14);border-color:rgba(59,130,246,.35)}.social-icon:active{transform:translateY(0) scale(1.02)}.social-icon img{width:1.25rem !important;height:1.25rem !important}
interactions.inlineContactLinks: .inline-contact-link{transition:transform .28s cubic-bezier(.4,0,.2,1),color .28s cubic-bezier(.4,0,.2,1),filter .28s cubic-bezier(.4,0,.2,1)}.inline-contact-link:hover{transform:translateY(-3px);color:#3b82f6;filter:drop-shadow(0 8px 16px rgba(59,130,246,.2))}.inline-contact-link img{transition:transform .28s cubic-bezier(.4,0,.2,1)}.inline-contact-link:hover img{transform:translateY(-1px) scale(1.08)}
